description: Delete a job production plan segment set
permissions: User must be authorized to delete the segment set's job production plan (delegated through the job_production_plan relationship).
side_effects: Deletes the segment set and nullifies its association on related job production plan segments. May enqueue a background job to update the job production plan checksum range when the plan is configured to update checksum range from segments.
validation_notes: Segment set ID argument is required. --confirm is required to delete.
